# Average ACI for each task, pw_FWHM, pw_order, HRF

```{r}
all_aci <- readRDS(file.path(dir_agg, "aci.rds"))
all_aci <- apply(all_aci, c(1,5,6,7), mean)
# dim(all_aci) # task 4, pw_FWHM 2, pw_order 4, HRF 2

all_aci2 <- array(dim=dim(all_aci) + c(1,0,0,0)) # adding an extra dimension to task
all_aci2[seq(4),,,] <- all_aci # save the calculated avg of ACI for each task from all_aci except the extra dimension
all_aci2[5,,,] <- colMeans(all_aci) # the extra dimension takes values of averaged values all tasks
dimnames_aci2 <- dimnames(all_aci) # using the same dimension names with the all_aci
dimnames_aci2$task <- c(dimnames_aci2$task, "all_task") # needed a name for the extra dimension 
dimnames(all_aci2) <- dimnames_aci2

iters <- do.call(expand.grid, dimnames(all_aci2)) # doing the same thing with the previously written code but shorter
df_aci <- data.frame(iters)
df_aci$avgACI <- c(all_aci2)

```


# Visualize the average ACI 
```{r}
require(ggplot2)
df_aci_all <- df_aci %>% filter(task == "all_task")

df_aci_local <- df_aci_all %>% filter(pw_FWHM == "5")
df_aci_local$pw_FWHM <- "local"
df_aci_global <- df_aci_all %>% filter(pw_FWHM == "Inf")
df_aci_global$pw_FWHM <- "global"
df_aci_all <- rbind(df_aci_local, df_aci_global)

df_aci_c <- df_aci_all %>% filter(HRF == "HRF")
df_aci_c$HRF <- "canonical"
df_aci_t <- df_aci_all %>% filter(HRF == "dHRF")
df_aci_t$HRF <- "canonical with its TD"
df_aci_all <- rbind(df_aci_c, df_aci_t)
df_aci <- df_aci_all

df_aci$groups <- paste0(df_aci$pw_FWHM, "_", df_aci$HRF) # combination of pw_FWHM and HRF to connect the dots
ggplot(data = df_aci, aes(x = pw_order, y = avgACI, color = pw_FWHM, shape = HRF, group=groups))+
     geom_point(size = 4) + lims(y = c(1.4,2))  + geom_line() +
     scale_shape_manual(values=c(16,22)) +
     labs(title = "Averaged ACI magnitudes comparison with AR model order",
          y = "Averaged ACI", x = "AR model order") +
     labs(color = "smoothing")  +
     theme_bw() +
     theme(axis.title = element_text(family = "Courier", size =(15)),
           axis.text = element_text(family = "Courier", size =(13)),
           legend.title = element_text(family = "Courier", face = "bold",size =(10)),
           legend.text = element_text(family = "Courier", size =(9)),
           legend.position = "bottom")
  
ggsave("avgACI4.png")

```


# Average AIC for each task, pw_FWHM, pw_order, HRF

```{r}
avg_aic <- readRDS(file.path(dir_agg, "aic.rds"))
avg_aic <- apply(avg_aic, c(1,5,6,7), mean)
# dim(all_aic) # task 4, pw_FWHM 2, pw_order 4, HRF 2

avg_aic2 <- array(dim=dim(avg_aic) + c(1,0,0,0)) # adding an extra dimension to task
avg_aic2[seq(4),,,] <- avg_aic # save the calculated avg of ACI for each task from all_aci except the extra dimension
avg_aic2[5,,,] <- colMeans(avg_aic) # the extra dimension takes values of averaged values all tasks
dimnames_aic2 <- dimnames(avg_aic) # using the same dimension names with the all_aci
dimnames_aic2$task <- c(dimnames_aic2$task, "all_task") # needed a name for the extra dimension 
dimnames(avg_aic2) <- dimnames_aic2

iters <- do.call(expand.grid, dimnames(avg_aic2)) # doing the same thing with the previously written code but shorter
df_aic <- data.frame(iters)
df_aic$avgAIC <- c(avg_aic2)

```


# Visualize the average AIC 
```{r}
require(ggplot2)
df_aic_all <- df_aic %>% filter(task == "all_task" & pw_FWHM == "5") # pw_order, HRF, avgAIC
df_aic_all <- df_aic_all[,c(3,4,5)]
df_aic_all$pw_FWHM <- c("local")
# df_aic_local <- df_aic_all %>% filter(pw_FWHM == "5")
# df_aic_local$pw_FWHM <- "local"
# df_aic_global <- df_aic_all %>% filter(pw_FWHM == "Inf")
# df_aic_global$pw_FWHM <- "global"
# df_aic_all <- rbind(df_aic_local, df_aic_global)

df_aic_c <- df_aic_all %>% filter(HRF == "HRF")
df_aic_c$HRF <- "canonical"
df_aic_t <- df_aic_all %>% filter(HRF == "dHRF")
df_aic_t$HRF <- "canonical with its TD"
df_aic_all <- rbind(df_aic_c, df_aic_t)
df_aic <- df_aic_all

df_aic$groups <- paste0(df_aic$pw_FWHM, "_", df_aic$HRF) # combination of pw_FWHM and HRF to connect the dots
ggplot(data = df_aic, aes(x = pw_order, y = avgAIC, color = HRF, group=groups))+
     geom_point() + lims(y = c(0,3))  + geom_line() +
     labs(title = "Averaged AIC magnitudes versus AR model orders with FWHM = 5",
          y = "Averaged AIC", x = "AR model order") +
     theme_bw() +
     theme(axis.title = element_text(family = "Courier", size =(15)),
           axis.text = element_text(family = "Courier", size =(13)),
           legend.title = element_text(family = "Courier", face = "bold",size =(10)),
           legend.text = element_text(family = "Courier", size =(9)),
           legend.position = "bottom")

ggsave("avgAIC.png")

```
